title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: In pencil on back: R. Taibbi 11 years
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Half drop repeat of street and water scene with man in gondola silk screened in three colors: blue, yellow, and red (yellow over blue for green).
